items.title: Wrestling Over Charlie Kirk’s Legacy and the Divide in America
items.summary: Historians say the lessons of this particular time will depend on Americans themselves, and what kind of a nation they want it to be.

items.title: Trump Escalates Attacks on Political Opponents After Charlie Kirk’s Killing
items.summary: President Trump has promised to bring the killer to justice while using the moment to blame the left — and only the left — more broadly.

items.title: Rubio Heads to a Defiant Israel After Qatar Strike
items.summary: The diplomat will consult with Israeli officials about their coming military offensive in Gaza City, as President Trump’s efforts to end the Gaza war appear stalled.

items.title: Trump Says He Will Impose More Sanctions on Russia if NATO Does
items.summary: It was the latest in a series of new conditions that President Trump had announced on punitive action against Russia for its war against Ukraine.

items.title: The Police Found Messages After Kirk’s Killing. What They Mean Is Unclear.
items.summary: The messages relied on an enigmatic, coded communication style used by the habitually online.

items.title: Kirk Assassination Puts America’s Political Spotlight on Campuses Again
items.summary: Colleges are often the setting, and the target, of the nation’s most heated politics. Charlie Kirk’s work on campuses was one factor.

items.title: Questions linger about alleged shooter’s motivation for killing Charlie Kirk
items.summary: <p>After a connection to ‘trans ideology’ was retracted, suspect’s background and politics are being pored over</p><p>Though the suspect in the <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/charlie-kirk-shooting">killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk</a> was revealed by authorities on Friday, questions surrounding his identity and motivations have exacerbated intense US political debates in the aftermath of the shooting.</p><p>Authorities revealed Kirk’s suspected killer to be Tyler Robinson, a 22-year-old man who grew up in Washington, <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/utah">Utah</a>, along the state’s south-western border.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/13/charlie-kirk-killing-alleged-shooter-motivation">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Charlie Kirk’s US campus tour will continue despite his death, widow says – US politics live
items.summary: <p>Erika Kirk said ‘my husband’s voice will remain’ despite his death</p><p>Images coming out of the far-right ‘Unite the Kingdom’ march in central London on Saturday show framed photographs of Charlie Kirk being held aloft as protesters gather.</p><p>The far-right activist and political commentator, who was fatally shot this week in Utah, galvanized young conservatives through <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/12/charlie-kirk-young-conservatives-social-media">online antics and inflammatory views</a>.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/13/charlie-kirk-suspect-tyler-robinson-erika-kirk-us-politics-latest-news-donald-trump">Continue reading...</a>
